node.script: var commandList = [ {'command': 'add-node', 'path': '.root', 'node': 'div', 'text': 'muhahaha'}, {'command': 'add-class', 'class': 'foo bar'}, {'command': 'remove-node', 'path': '.root .foo'}, {'command': 'add-node', 'path': '.root', 'node': 'div', 'text': 'another muhaha'}, {'command': 'add-class', 'class': 'new one'}, {'command': 'remove-class', 'class': 'new'}, {'command': 'set-text', 'path': '.one', 'text': 'updated text'}, {'command': 'add-node', 'node': 'div', 'text': 'submode'}, ]; Edde.MiniDiff.patch(commandList, $('.root'));
